text: llVV ("All Tvvins"; the first two characters are lower-case L's) is the debut album by Irish electronic rock band All Tvvins. It was released through Warner Music UK on August 12, 2016. == Track listing == ==Uses in media== * Their single "Darkest Ocean" was featured in the soundtrack of FIFA 16, the video game by EA Sports. * Their song, "Thank You" featured as soundtrack in Konami game, Pro Evolution Soccer 2017. * Their song “Resurrect Me” is used on the 2020 Sky Sports television advert for the GAA championship. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2016) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |} == References == Category:2016 debut albums Category:All Tvvins albums Category:Warner Records albums
title: LlVV
